reviewText: This is a two dvd. The dvds are on separate discs. I wish they were on one. However, both stories are nice. They are short but good.
Almost  90 minutes of Thomas. Well worth the price. Prompt delivery.
Great deal for two full Thomas features!
One of the DVDs stops continuously, very dark image, had to throw it away. The other DVD is ok though.
This is the old-school Thomas (before computer animation)!  Each story is pretty short (6 minutes on average).  My preschoolers have enjoyed it.
It was a gift for a little boy and he was very happy. Loves Thomas the Train..
Great price. Christmas gift for my 2 year old nephew so no opinion of content at this time.
